name: VCO - Waveshaping
description: This algorithm is based on the OG disting algorithms “B-8 VCO with waveshaping” and “B-7 VCO with linear FM”. There are four oscillator outputs: Triangle/saw, Square/pulse, Sub-octave square, Sine. A shared waveshape parameter/CV controls both the shape of the triangle/saw and sine waves and the pulse width of the square/pulse wave. Linear through-zero FM is available via the ‘FM input’ parameter. If the ‘Sync’ input is used, a rising edge on the input sets the VCO phase to zero, which can produce oscillator sync sounds [116]. Note that it is perfectly valid to set the output bus for the four signals to the same bus, in which case they can be blended to taste with their gain parameters.

input_ports.name: Shape input
input_ports.description: The waveshape CV input (scaled so that ±5V correspond to the ±100% parameter range).

output_ports.name: Triangle/saw output
output_ports.description: The output bus for the triangle/saw signal.
